value.excerpt: What is mindfulness? Ritu Bhasin explains what mindfulness is and how a mindfulness practice can be leveraged in your career.  - - - - -   bhasin consulting inc. value.title: What is Minimization Culture?
value.excerpt: Minimization culture tells us that there are certain rules to follow in order to get ahead at work. In this video, DEI expert Ritu Bhasin discusses the problems with minimization and how leaders can inclusively coach diverse professionals for success, not conformity.  - - - - -   bhasin consulting inc.

value.title: Why It's Important to Teach White Leaders About Interrupting Racial Bias
value.excerpt: As a leader, how can you create workplaces where people of color and Indigenous peoples feel supported and like they have better access to opportunities, mentorship, sponsorship and more? It starts with learning about racial bias and how to interrupt it.  Watch now!  - - - - -  bhasin consulting inc.

value.title: How Bias Causes BIPOC Professionals to Hold Back at Work

value.title: The Connection Between Ethnoculture and Race
value.excerpt: When we talk about race, most of us are actually talking about ethnoculture and how people identify ethnoculturally.
